channel.title: Zedd || 474 || Tons of Content || 24/7 Uptime || No Lag ||
channel.description:
[center][img]http://puu.sh/2gKdW[/img][/center]/ [center][size=18pt][b][url=http://www.zedd-rsps.tk]Website[/url] || Forums under Construction || [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/ot36r0ebznqq3rt/Zedd%20client%20%28release%29.zip]DL Client[/url][/b][/size][/center]
[size=18pt][b]Features:[/b][/size]
---> Revision-602 animations and GFX ---> Chaotics ---> Spirit Shields ---> PvP armor ---> Tormented Demons ---> 100% all skills work, with the exception of Hunter and Summoning ---> 100% working special-attacks ---> Great economy ---> Perfect PvP ---> 100% curses with correct animations/GFX and boosts. ---> Clan chat. ---> Emotes. ---> All modern/ancient spells work & Vengeance works too. ---> Donator Zone & donator-only perks. ---> Donator-only features (NPCs, training areas, shops, minigames) ---> Quest tab reworked. ---> XP lock/unlock. ---> PvP and Slayer points with respective shops. ---> Jad, all godwars bosses, etc. ---> Minigames ---> Hitsplats/hitbar/x10 hitting are all toggle-able. ---> RFD quest/shop/minigame ---> Fun PvP area ---> Alert system (update alert system too) ---> Auto-cache downloader! The client download is only 3.26MB now :D ---> 100% private-chat! ---> 100% all dupes fixed! ---> Perfect dueling! ---> Perfect godwars! ---> 100% slayer with easy/medium/hard task distinction!
---> SO MUCH MORE, LOOK AT MEDIA FOR EVERYTHING!
[size=18pt][b]Media:[/b][/size]
[center][img]http://puu.sh/2gK9q[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2gK8r[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2ioU4[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2ioUZ[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2gK4U[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2ioWy[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2ioVM[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2ioX5[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2ip1U[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2gJYR[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2gJSV[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2gJOX[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2gJNO[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2gJLN[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2gJHS[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2gJwF[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2gJvs[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2gJsg[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2gJjo[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2gJeW[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2gJdS[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2ioD2[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2ioEn[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2ioEU[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2ioHt[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2ioLQ[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2ioMF[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2ioPT[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2ioRl[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2ioS9[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2ip4X[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2ipcI[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2iBMD[/img][/center]
[size=18pt][b]There's even more than this, far too much to put in one thread, come check us out![/b][/size]
Any questions, post here or use the contact info found on the website.
[size=18pt][b]Server Specs:[/b][/size] Haven't seen a lot of other server adverts include this, but I thought it'd be something useful.
[code]OS Name: Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 Datacenter Version: 6.1.7601 Service Pack 1 Build 7601 OS Manufacturer Microsoft Corporation System Name ZEDD System Manufacturer Microsoft Corporation System Type x64-based PC Processor AMD Opteron(tm) Processor 4171 HE, 2094 Mhz, 4 Core(s), 4 Logical Processor(s) Processor AMD Opteron(tm) Processor 4171 HE, 2094 Mhz, 4 Core(s), 4 Logical Processor(s) Installed Physical Memory (RAM) 14.0 GB Total Physical Memory 14.0 GB Available Physical Memory 12.5 GB Total Virtual Memory 18.0 GB Available Virtual Memory 16.4 GB Page File Space 4.00 GB [/code]

item.description:
@PsychoScapeRSPS wrote:

[quote=“morterdestroyer, post:2, topic:508405”]Nothing new. Thanks4Share.[/quote]Maybe not, but keep in mind it’s a beta. There will be lots of stuff to come. I’m working on castle wars and dominion tower.

And it may not be new, but at least it’s all original and not a leech.

[size=18pt]Features:[/size]

—> Revision-602 animations and GFX
—> Chaotics
—> Spirit Shields
